metadata.title: CVE-2022-32215 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module inNode.js does not correctly handle multi-line Transfer-Encoding headers.This can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
nodejs - 18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2').
